/usr/lib/nvidia-cuda-toolkit/bin/g++   CMakeFiles/refactor.dir/main.cu.o CMakeFiles/refactor.dir/cmake_device_link.o -o refactor /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_system.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_filesystem.so  -L"/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/stubs" -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
